Nightlight::

Nightlight huged him and said "One of those days, this war will end, but 
while that happen we should enjoy theses breaks that our enemies give us..."


>From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Rodimus Prime
>Date: Wed, 04 Sep 2002 00:03:55 -0400
>
>: : Rodimus Prime : :
>
>Rodimus set his plate on a near by table. He then pulls Nightlight close to 
>him, resting her head on his shoulder.
>
>Rodimus Prime: I wish that these wars could end once and for all. After I 
>destroyed Unicron and sent Galvatron to the other side of the galaxy in 
>2005, I announced the "End of the Cybertronion Wars." I actually believed 
>it then. But I wasn't able to keep the Decepticons down and here we are 
>today. Stuck in the past on Earth, Maximals and Predacons fighting as I saw 
>Autobots and Decepticons do so long ago.
